title: Secure Online Payment
subtitle: Included with Online Shopfront
description: Take customer orders online easily. Payments are processed securely by Stripe, a leading payment infrastructure company. Setup is straightforward and once setup, you can receive processed payments in real-time on your connected Stripe account.

title: Delivery Coverage
subtitle: Included with Online Shopfront
description: Define where you want to deliver your meals and only allow orders from these suburbs. You can set your self-managed delivery coverage even if you don't use our Last-mile Delivery service.

title: Promotion Tools
subtitle: Included with Online Shopfront
description: Set discount coupon codes for your promotion campaigns to promote new products or grow your audience.

title: Council-compliant Kitchen
subtitle: Included with Commercial Kitchen
description: Access a shared kitchen that is already approved for commercial use by the local council. The kitchens are well equipped and are located around central Melbourne. Availability is limited so please contact us ahead to discuss.

title: Temporary Cold and Dry Storage
subtitle: Included with Commercial Kitchen
description: Store your ingredients and prepared meals in the complimentary storage area. Businesses can be allocated a storage section to temporarily store any cold or dry items. Availability is limited so please contact us ahead to discuss.

title: Refrigerated Delivery
subtitle: Included with Last-mile Delivery
description: Our delivery vans are refrigerated down to -18 degree Celsius and comes with electric standby to ensure that your products are always kept at the right temperature throughout the journey.

title: Delivery Notifications
subtitle: Included with Last-mile Delivery
description: We use a leading route planning software for our delivery optimisation and this allows us to send delivery notifications to your customers. Your customers can also track the precise location of our drivers online once they are 60 minutes away.

title: Preorder Window Settings
subtitle: Included with Batch Order Processing
description: Define when you want to take and deliver orders. We can also work with you to create your own unique rules.

title: Order List
subtitle: Included with Batch Order Processing
description: At the end of each preorder window, receive a list of the meals ordered and their respective quantity so that you can start preparing for the cook.

title: Individual Packing Slip
subtitle: Included with Batch Order Processing
description: In addition to the order list, receive packing slips that you can print out for your packing staff and delivery team. We can also work with you to ensure that the format is compatible with your thermal printer.

title: Subscription Model
subtitle: Coming Soon
description: Define your own subscription plans and let your customers subscribe to your meals. Create a recurring revenue stream!
